article_title: Hope Clinic continues to live up to its name in Pamlico County
article_text:
By Charlie Hall, Sun Journal Staff

Posted Feb. 14, 2015 at 12:01 AM

Updated Feb 14, 2015 at 4:59 PM

article_metadata.description: BAYBORO | Despite health care insurance reform, about 1,000 Pamlico County residents still rely on the free Hope Clinic as their primary source of medical care.
article_metadata.author: Charlie Hall, Sun Journal Staff
